title: Godblade
description: The Age of Gods. A god of fire, the bearer of the blade descends from the mountain on a quest to seek the truth. A young goddess of air, born of fire and water, discovers the darkness in the world, and the god of storms carries the secret of mages. In the clash of power between the gods, mercy turns to destruction.In this prequel series to the Bestselling 'Book of One' series, set in the Second Age, the Truefire Trilogy tells the story of the ancient gods, the rise of the mages, the people of the sands, the origin of dragons, as they battle for the power of the sword of the gods.Note: This book is now called 'Godblade'. The original title 'Godsword' caused some confusion and a technical glitch during its initial release, whereby it was accidentally cross-listed with a religious text. The book and the name of the series have been renamed to avoid any further confusion.This is a fantasy novel.
author: Jordan  Baker
